title: Brand Creative Company Website by Asen Sokolov
descr: Web developer based in Dubai, UAE. With more than 8 year experience and more than 100 project behind his back as a part of Xec-studio family.

generalInfo:
BR&ND CREATIVE is a limited liability company set up and operating in Dubai, U.A.E. They are specialized in branded retail and hospitality interiors. Comprised of a talented group of artists from many disciplines (interiors, architecture, engineering and graphics) they are able to provide retailers and business owners with unique, creative solutions that can impact sales and increase brand awareness.

BR&ND CREATIVE create engaging spaces that build audiences, foster brand awareness, provoke thought and target desired demographics. The ability to instinctively connect with consumers on an emotional level is the driving force behind their success.
typographyDescr: The Neue Helvetica sets new standards in terms of its form and number of variants. It is the quintessential sans serif font, timeless and neutral, and can be used for all types of communication.
creativeDescr:
PROJECT ASSIGNMENT: Develop custom made company website with nice and smooth animations.

PROJECT IMPLEMENTATION: BR&ND CREATIVE team provided all the designs for the website and my part was to implement them using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript. With attention to detail and very light and smooth animations I developed an extremely beautiful product, very clean and focused on all strengths of BR&ND CREATIVE.

Browsing the website is extremely easy, fast and accessible through any mobile device.

A feedback from my client Mohammed El Hijazi (Managing Director) says it all:

Since the initial meeting I understood that Asen have the ability to create the website I'v been dreaming of, his ability to translate my comments into technical language is impressive and some of the features he implemented I didn't even know existed!

The result: a responsive website with different animation and tools working across all platforms. Since the launch of the website, the positive feedback we are getting from friends and clients is immense.

PROJECT DEVELOPED BY: Asen Sokolov
